name: ClaimSubmit
title: Submit Prior Authorization Request
description: Submit a prior authorization request Bundle containing a Claim resource and supporting documentation for processing by the payer. This POC implementation supports both synchronous and asynchronous processing based on the complexity of the request.
comment: This operation follows the Da Vinci PAS implementation guide patterns. The request Bundle must contain a Claim resource as the primary entry along with all referenced supporting resources (Patient, Coverage, Organization, etc.). The response will be synchronous for auto-approvable requests or asynchronous with a Task for manual review.

parameter.name: request
parameter.documentation: The Prior Authorization Request Bundle containing the Claim and all supporting resources conforming to PAS profiles

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: The Prior Authorization Response Bundle containing either: 1) ClaimResponse with final determination for synchronous processing, or 2) Task resource for asynchronous processing with polling instructions
